definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: the double:—´[[כ]] cstr.: ´[[בְּכ]] [[רִסְנוֹ]] Job 41:5 within the double of his jaw (i.e. his double jaws) who can come ? elsewhere du. [[כִּפְלַיִם]] (cf. Ar. kifla0ni), [[לְתוּשִׁיׇּה]] Job 11:6 double in sound wisdom (beyond what Job imagines), of retribution Is 40:2.
